VUPShionMod:PrayerStance.NAME: Praying Stance
DESCRIPTION: While in this #yStance, you deal #b50% less damage. NL Healing is #b50% more effective. NL At the end of your turn, heal #b2 HP.

VUPShionMod:JudgeStance.NAME: Judging Stance
DESCRIPTION: When you play an #yAttack, trigger #yPunitive. NL Damage from #yPunitive reduce by #b50% .

VUPShionMod:SpiritStance.NAME: Wordpower Stance
DESCRIPTION: Regarded as in both #yJudging #yStance and #yPraying #yStance. NL Can not enter #yJudging #yStance. NL When you play an #yAttack, trigger #yPunitive. NL Gain #b5 max HP at the end of combat. NL Whenever you lose HP,gain #yShield equal to half of that amount. NL #yPunitive will not damage you.

VUPShionMod:SpiralBladeStance.NAME: Helix Razor
DESCRIPTION: Lose #b3 #yConstruct #yRecharge each turn. NL Whenever you play an #yAttack, lose #b1 additional #yConstruct #yRecharge, deal #b6 damage to ALL enemies and apply #b4 #yBleeding.

VUPShionMod:ThousandsOfBladeStance.NAME: Myriad Slicer
DESCRIPTION: Lose #b3 #yConstruct #yRecharge each turn. NL At the start of your turn, gain #b2 #yStrength. NL Whenever you play an #yAttack, you lose #b1 additional #yConstruct #yRecharge and play the Attack for an additional time.

VUPShionMod:LotusOfWarStance.NAME: Bloodthirsty Lotus
DESCRIPTION: Lose #b1 #yConstruct #yRecharge each turn. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E], #b1 #yStrength and #yDexterity.

VUPShionMod:RuinGuardianStance.NAME: Ruin Warden
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b1 #yConstruct #yRecharge each turn. NL When you enter this #yStance, #yExhaust up to #b1 #ySkill. NL At the start of your turn, play 1 copy of each #ySkill that was then exhausted.

VUPShionMod:LightArmorStance.NAME: Bright Armor
DESCRIPTION: Lose #b2 #yConstruct #yRecharge each turn. NL When you enter this #yStance, #yExhaust up to #b2 #yAttacks. NL At the start of your turn, play 1 copy of each Attack that was then exhausted. NL You take #b30% less damage from enemy attacks.
